Package structures

Class Word

java.lang.Object
structures.Word
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Word>
public class Word
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Word>, java.io.Serializable
This class constructs the word object that is instantiated and used by the WordTracker and used throughout the program. Each Word object holds relevant information on the what the specific word is, which file the word was found in, and what line of the file the word was found.
Author:
Alex Fleury, Christian Lay, Brandon Donkersloot, Kin Shing Chong
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • Word

      public Word​(int lineNumber, java.lang.String fileName, java.lang.String word)
      Constructor of the Word object that sets all attribute values to the current data being read.
      Parameters:
      lineNumber - value of the current line in the document
      fileName - value of the name in the current document
      word - value of the current word in the document

    • Word

      public Word​(java.lang.String word)
      Constructor of Word object that only sets the word attribute to the current data being read.
      Parameters:
      word - String of the current word in the document
